section: Beverage Agreement means that certain Beverage Agreement, Pepsi dated January 1, 2011.
explanation: This definition restricts the ability of Network Affiliate to display or promote any beverage other than Pepsi. This could limit the products offered at the theatres and impact potential revenue.

section: NCM will own the small d Equipment it has purchased pursuant to Section 2.1(b) (the NCM Equipment). NCM shall depreciate the cost of the NCM Equipment on a calendar quarterly basis, provided that the method used will result in full depreciation at the end of the five-year period commencing on the Effective Date. Upon expiration or termination of the Agreement for any reason, Network Affiliate shall pay NCM the value of the NCM Equipment, if any, that remains on NCMs financial statements as of the time of such expiration or termination. Upon payment of such amount to NCM by Network Affiliate at the time of such expiration or termination, NCMs ownership interest in the NCM Equipment will transfer to Network Affiliate.
explanation: There is a structural flaw in the text. If the equipment is fully depreciated, then according to the text there is no value and the network affiliate will pay NCM nothing. However, in the event of early termination, it is unclear if NCM will be able to recoup the cost of their equipment if they terminate early.

section: Each party represents and warrants that: (c) Each party is the exclusive owner of, or otherwise has or will have timely obtained all rights, licenses, clearances and consents necessary to make the grants of rights made or otherwise perform its obligations under this Agreement.
explanation: The party represents and warrants that they will have secured the rights to perform their obligations under the agreement. This is an omission because there is no time frame when it comes to the licenses or consents being cleared. They could secure it a day before, or a year before.
